title: Introduction to Python
author: John Doe
authorDescription: John Doe is a software engineer with over 10 years of experience in Python development.
description: Learn the basics of Python programming in this comprehensive course. Suitable for beginners with no prior programming experience.
requirements: A computer with internet access and a basic understanding of computer use.
learningOutcomes: Understand the fundamental concepts of programming using Python
Learn how to write basic Python scripts
Gain experience working with common Python data types and structures
Be able to use Python to solve basic problems

title: Advanced Python
author: Jane Smith
authorDescription: Jane Smith is a senior software engineer with extensive experience in building large-scale Python applications.
description: Take your Python skills to the next level with this advanced course. Learn how to build large-scale Python applications.
requirements: A solid understanding of Python programming and experience working with Python.
learningOutcomes: Understand advanced concepts in Python such as object-oriented programming and decorators
Learn how to design and build large-scale Python applications
Gain experience working with common Python libraries and frameworks
Be able to optimize and debug Python code
